body.p: At the .05 significance level, we therefore:

multiple_choice.choice: reject Ho, since .087 falls inside the confidence interval.
cannot reject Ho, since .087 falls inside the confidence interval.
reject Ho, since .087 falls outside the confidence interval.
cannot reject Ho, since .087 falls outside the confidence interval.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Since .087 falls inside the confidence interval (as it does), we are 95% confident that it is a plausible value for p. Try again.

Correct. Indeed, since .087 falls inside the 95% confidence interval for p, this means that we are 95% confidence that .087 is a plausible value for p. This is equivalent to not being able to reject Ho: p = .087 at the .05 significance level.
Incorrect. .087 actually falls inside the confidence interval, which means that we are 95% confident that it is one of the plausible values for p.
Incorrect. .087 actually falls inside the confidence interval, which means that we are 95% confident that it is one of the plausible values for p.
